channel.title: Protocols for Future, Large-Scale & Diverse Network Transports
channel.description: Recent content on Protocols for Future, Large-Scale & Diverse Network Transports

item.description: PFLDnet 2010 - Paper submission instructions    November 28-29, 2010 Franklin & Marshall College    Lancaster, Pennsylvania -- Submission Instructions Paper Format: The papers must be in PDF format, US letter sized, with a maximum length of 6 pages (including all figures and references). Font size should be 10pt or larger and all fonts must be embedded in the PDF file.
